name: Immersive Jurassic World Roller Coaster VR
name_original: Immersive Jurassic World Roller Coaster VR
description:
This is a unique 3D casual game. Bringing players into the original lush forest and exotic planet through immersive VR technology, and experience the world of dinosaurs.
First, let's take a look at the theme scene of Jurassic. Players can take the roller coaster through the dense forests and feel the shocking effect of the Jurassic period. The realistic dinosaur model will make you feel that you are in the primitive world. With the entry and departure of roller coaster, you will constantly be challenged by the acceleration of heartbeat during high -speed, downhill, and rapid turn, and feel thrilling stimulation.



If you like exotic style, then Exotic Planet is the theme scene you must not miss. On this planet, you can see a variety of plants and colors full of exotic styles, and feel different visual enjoyment. Not only that, the dinosaurs flying in the air add a touch of mystery to this planet, all of which make the planet more beautiful and mysterious.



The gameplay is relatively simple. You only need to control the speed of the roller coaster through the handle. Whether it is slowly appreciating or fast stimulation, there is always one suitable for you. The style of the entire game is very beautiful, the scene is fine and properly arranged, allowing players to fully integrate into the game and enjoy the most authentic feeling.
In this game, you can switch two different theme scenes at any time. Each scene can bring you different visual and experiences, help you relax the pressure, and find your heart calm. If you like VR games and are also interested in dinosaurs and exotic planets, then this game is definitely worth your try.

Operation method:

1. The handle menu key displays the menu and switch the handle
2. Use the upper and lower buttons on the handle to change the speed of the roller coaster
